title: Hello World!
content: Hello and welcome to my site.  Here you will find tips and tricks, rants and raves, and various doodads to keep your mind wandering.  It is my sincerest wish that this site will not only showcase my abilities as a programmer, but will also show you who I am as a person.  With that in mind I want to emphasize that this is a personal site, and I will be expressing myself to the fullest of my capabilities. All, while staying out of correctional facilities.  So sit back, relax, butter up some popcorn and stay a while.
